name: places/ChIJBS7NRqBZwokRcz_ArUhLkvY
formattedAddress: 32 Gramercy Pk S # 1, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 32 Gramercy Pk S # 1, New York, NY 10003-1707, USA

originalText.text: I had a prepaid spot, with a confirmation number and a bar code and the attendant still demanded more money. The guy was rude, belligerent, and he forced us to stand there and justify a prepaid receipt. I can't say I've ever encountered an attendant at a lot in Manhattan like this before. He then proceeded to take about 10 minutes with my printed receipt looking at it, and refused to give me a ticket. I took photos of him and the complaint number and told him I would file a formal complaint against him. Only then did he grudgingly acquiesce. And when we returned he tried to charge us more again. And again, I showed him the bar code, paid receipt, and he jerked us around for another 5 minutes or so. Bizarre. But don't even remotely think of parking at this garage.

originalText.text:
Manhattan parking gramercy Co
I wanted a space to park my car for a couple of hours but wanted a place to be a little cheap and close to the event I was about to attend. This is a small underground garage and it’s easy to navigate to and find.

MPG has a valet parking style so once you get in the garage you have to leave the keys and the staff working there would park the car in the space that’s available. I had an online reservation and the online booking process was 6hrs minimum which cost me $27 with taxes and fees. I needed the space for 4hrs so once I reached the place I told the guy working there that I’d be needing the car in 4hrs and he parked the car accordingly.

I thing I forgot was the receipt that they give after reaching the spot. I kept it on my dash which was a mistake so when we returned to get our car back the dude working couldn’t understand that I had kept the parking receipt on the dash so had to explain him which was a little troublesome. Overall, my experience was decent.

originalText.text: We had a confirmed reservation last night, through Spot Hero, for a 6 PM reserved parking spot in this garage.  I arrived exactly 6PM and I was told to back up the ramp, in the rain and leave because the garage was full. To make a long story short the Valet refused to honor my reservation even after I showed him my confirmation on my phone. He was rude, uncaring  and unhelpful and had no suggestions as to where I could park in the area.  I asked to speak with the manager and he told me he would be in the next morning.  I asked him to get the manager on the phone and he refused.  Do not park in this poorly managed garage with a rude and uncaring staff.

originalText.text: Very shady practices here. Made a reservation in their app 2 weeks in advance for a Wednesday starting at 4:15pm - 9:45pm paid $30.00 in advance. Great deal for Grammercy. When we arrived at 4:13pm the attendant didn't want anything to do with QR code or reservation and said to show it when we left. Ok. Off we go to dinner and our show. At some point I see I have an email stating our reservation was cancelled! The reservation is gone in the app. Sure enough when we go to pick up our car at 8:36pm the code I have in my email doesn't work...we now have to pay an additional $50.00 to get our car. On the drive home I see the email stating our reservation was cancelled came in at 4:11pm - 4 minutes before it was to start. I email customer service the next day - big surprise they issued a credit for the $30......not the $50.00. Never again with these clowns.

originalText.text: The valet that was there gave me a stink face when I arrived and blocked me from entering for a minute before deciding to let me in. It costs $52.00 to be there with the up to 12 hour rate which is super expensive compared to a few others down the street that’s much cheaper. I will not be coming back there ever again
